backend/main.mo: Main actor defining SurgeryCase data types with CompletedTasks (replacing Checklist), user profiles, OpenAI config, and CRUD operations for cases with authorization checks via MixinAuthorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old SurgeryCase records with 'checklist' field to new records with 'completedTasks' field while preserving all other data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented requirements: task checkboxes in case creation form with defaults, storing only checked tasks in case data, and displaying only selected tasks on case cards.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files showing completedTasks usage throughout, ChecklistEditor with creation/completion modes, and CSV import/export with task handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors, borders, and component styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest links, favicon references, theme color meta tags, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, and categories for Surgery Case Log application.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell, skipping Internet Identity and API calls, with runtime caching for JS/CSS/images.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication flow, actor initialization, profile setup modal, view switching between cases/settings, admin-only settings access, and forced light theme with retry logic for actor failures.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity for authentication and clears the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for new users to enter their name during initial profile setup, with form validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items for surgery case tasks (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with utilities to get default selections, remaining items, and task counts.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Card component displaying surgery case details with edit/delete actions and checkboxes for completing remaining tasks.
Dialog form for creating/editing surgery cases with AI-powered text parsing, MRN lookup for auto-prefill, and task checklist management.
Main view component for displaying surgery cases with search, sort, species/task filters, and CSV import/export functionality.
Search input component with icon for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select component for choosing case sorting options (by arrival date, pet name, etc.).
Popover filter component with checkboxes for filtering cases by species, persisting selections to session storage.
A popover filter component that allows users to select task types to filter surgery cases by incomplete tasks, with session storage persistence and an active filter count badge.
A checklist editor component that renders checkboxes for CompletedTasks fields, supporting both creation and completion modes with optional default indicators.
A panel component that handles CSV export of surgery cases and CSV import with progress tracking, error reporting, and backend synchronization via create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component combining a text field (MM/DD/YYYY format) with a calendar popover picker for flexible date entry.
Implements CSV export and import logic for surgery cases, including parsing, validation, boolean conversion, and matching against existing cases by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for surgery case import/export with headers, types, validation constants, and detailed documentation of expected formats and field mappings.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species and incomplete task types, plus a combined filter/sort pipeline function.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removing artifacts as a fallback for AI analysis.

Parses semi-structured text (label:value format) into CaseFormData fields, serving as a fallback for AI responses and Quick Fill feature. Includes extensive logging and handles various field patterns for medical records, pet info, dates, species, and sex.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by query string across multiple fields including medical record number, pet/owner names, species, sex, dates, breed, complaints, notes, and incomplete checklist items.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file placeholder for AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with four options: arrival date (newest/oldest) and open tasks count (most/fewest), with secondary sorting by arrival date for stability.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms including Species and Sex options, and the CaseFormData interface with fields for medical records, pet info, dates, and complaints.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required field validation, species/sex parsing with flexible string matching, and date parsing supporting multiple formats (M/D/YYYY, ISO, etc.).
frontend/src/features/settings/component: React component for application settings page that allows users to configure and validate OpenAI API key for AI-powered document scanning and data extraction features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout cleanup pattern.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and derivation origin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, including fetching all cases, fetching by MRN, creating, and updating cases with comprehensive logging and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme using OKLCH color space, including custom colors for patient names and presenting complaints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the Tesseract.js OCR library, including worker options, recognition results, and text structure interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the medical case management app's architecture, features for task checklist management during case creation, and pending feature requests for task display.
